description: Retrieves details about the Amazon Web Services Resource Explorer index in the Amazon Web Services Region in which you invoked the operation.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon resource name (ARN) of the index.

nested_items.name: CreatedAt
nested_items.description: The date and time when the index was originally created.

nested_items.name: LastUpdatedAt
nested_items.description: The date and time when the index was last updated.

nested_items.name: ReplicatingFrom
nested_items.description: This response value is present only if this index is Type=AGGREGATOR.

nested_items.name: ReplicatingTo
nested_items.description: This response value is present only if this index is Type=LOCAL.

nested_items.name: State
nested_items.description: The current state of the index in this Amazon Web Services Region.

nested_items.name: Type
nested_items.description: The type of the index in this Region. For information about the aggregator index and how it differs from a local index, see Turning on cross-Region search by creating an aggregator index.
